name: 嬰幼兒雙語研究
restrict: ◎必須先修過【HGM0195  嬰幼兒語言發展研究】 ◎課程不開放上修
description: 本課程目標在促進學生對嬰幼兒雙語和第二語言發展歷程、研究及相關理論的瞭解，並培養學生執行嬰幼兒雙語或第二語言發展研究的能力。探討的主題包括雙語的定義、嬰幼兒雙語發展歷程、嬰幼兒雙語和認知發展、雙語和第二語言習得理論、嬰幼兒雙語課程、兒童華語研究、兒童英語研究等。課程實施方式包括專書和期刊論文講述、評析與討論、學生專題研究報告等。
goals: 促進學生對嬰幼兒雙語發展歷程、研究及相關理論的了解
奠定學生設計和執行嬰幼兒雙語發展研究的能力
syllabus: This course aims to provide the students with a broad introduction to studies in bilingualism in infancy and early childhood, with special focus on English/Chinese as a second/foreign language acquisition and education. Themes discussed in this course include definitions of bilingualism, early bilingual development, bilingualism and thinking, measurement of bilingualism, bilingualism and culture, bilingualism and language policies, forms of bilingual education, bilingualism and second language acquisition, EFL/CSL/CFS acquisition and education in young children, etc. Students are expected to get familiar with knowledge and issues related to early bilingualism and bilingual education.
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【HGM0195  嬰幼兒語言發展研究】
